body.name: Full Automatic Washer Machine,Portable Washing Machine for Household Use,1.34 Cu.Ft.Laundry Washer Spin with 10 Wash Programs& LED Display& Built-in Drain Pump,Ideal for RV,Camping,Apartment
features: 💧【Easy to Connect】Our full automatic washing machine is equiped with quick connect adapter kit(US Standard size faucet adaptor) and built-in powerful pump.It will be very easy to connect the inlet hose to your faucet and just hang up the drain hose to a bathtub or a sink.

💧【Easy to Operate & Multi-Function】There are 10 programs of your choice, 8 water level selections, and LED display on the control panel.We have prepared a detailed user's manual to help better using this machine.You can select Delay Start up to 24 hours.To avoid injuries caused by kids accidentally opening the machine during operation, our washer has the function of stopping when the lid is opened, and also has the function of child lock, see the manual for details.

💧【Portable & Space-Saving】This portable washing machine has 2 handles for lifting on both sides.It is light and compact for saving your space. Its fully dimensions are 19.7" *19.7" *33.5". But the inner stainless steel tub can load up to 100lbs at one time. It can be suitable for RV's, dormitory, apartment, camping, bathroom, etc.

💧【Imbalance Adjustment & Adjustable Foot】Our portable washing machine is equipped with Auto Unbalance Detection (AUD), this allows the system to automatically correct the imbalance problem. If the laundry is placed unevenly in the tub, it would cause violent vibration. At this point, our washing machine can easily avoid violent shaking.With an adjustable foot, this portable washing machine can adapt well to all kinds of uneven ground.

💧【Extremely Energy Saving】This high efficiency washing machine is equiped with high quality and powerful motor. You can choose 8 levels(1/23L 2/26L 3/29L 4/33L 5/36L 6/39L 7/42L 8/46L) of water to meet your different needs. Our washine machine can save as much 85% energy consumption comparing to similar models.Let's relief our hands.
📞【Professional After-Sales Team】If you have any queries with quality/delivery/return policy, please feel free to contact us, our customer service will reply to you within 24 hours.

If I receive my washer and find that there is a little water left , is it used? No, all of our machines have to go through rigorous testing to eliminate inferior products, so some of the machines may have a little water residue, all of our products are brand new. Can I make a laundry appointment in advance? Yes, our portable washing machine has a delayed booking feature so you can book your laundry up to 24 hours in advance! Does it have a child lock? Yes, we have prepared for you to introduce the detailed instructions for use, you can also seek our team for help. What to do if my washing machine stops working? There is a troubleshooting table in our manual, so you can follow the troubleshooting tips such as E0, E1, etc. to find out the cause of the malfunction and you can also seek our team in time to help solve the problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleased with this purchase!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as I live in a studio with my 2 month old. I hated going to a laundry mat every week and spending so much. I purchased this and definitely in love. The clothes are washed better than I expected. This was so worth every penny spent!

reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not work
reviews.reviewText: Looks like a nice little washer but Got the product but does not turn on at all

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A good machine with good power
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the Outspurge full automatic washer about three weeks ago, and received it in less than a week. From the photos, it looked nearly identical to the machine that I had for nearly five years, but I ordered a larger size. There was some confusion over this. When it arrived, it was not any taller or wider than the 1.34 Cu Ft unit that had died. I felt sure a mistake had been made, and the seller very graciously offered a full return. After "Re-shopping" for another machine, I realized I may as well keep and try this new one.Nice surprise - the tub IS bigger! Even better is that the speed and power of this machine surpasses the old one. It spins out better, does a nice job of washing, and even collects lint in the lint trap more efficiently. My only dislike is that the water input hose is rather short, but as I kept the old one from the broken machine to use the adapters for the kitchen sink, I discovered it fit perfectly! here's hoping for another five years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Had a problem with delivery but seller was Johnny on the spot.. far exceeded my expectations.. to top it all off the washer is great... Easy to use and washes really well. Price was great, too! Would highly highly recommend.
